__e: Yes, I love you, so, of course, I'm going to want to know what's going on, why this mission needs to be so secretive, why you need so many guns, but I'm willing to put all that aside.
I guess I just... felt like it was a date because we're a secret, and... it brought me back to a bad time in my life.
Okay. I've got eyeballs on the dungeon door. And there is a lady guard.
You've got more angst than The Secret Life of the American Teenager.
Psst! You have a whole life we don't know about, don't you? Tommy...
And here's the secret door I told you about.
Yeah, that he never even told us about.
Well, the bigger problem is keeping the truth about you a secret.
The first favour I would ask of you is to help keep my visit here a secret.
She wants to keep it on the down low, which is cool by me.
You Have A Secret Husband And A Secret Sex Room?
You had a secret family the whole time You had a secret family the whole time and you never once told them about me?
Now captain's got us going the wrong direction? To run some mystery mission for some broad?
Did you do that secret thingy I asked you to do?
This... whole secret life... what do you do?
I only knew it was private and mustn't be seen. It wasn't to be mentioned.
Okay, we need a secret word in case I need to make a quick escape.
Oh, and my husband died, and I found out, crazily enough, after he passed away that he has a secret family living down in Florida.
You got some secret family in another state that you go visit?
